verses.text:
And it came to pass, \add that\add* when \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* had made an \w end|strong="H3615"\w* of \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* unto all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* all the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, for which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w* had \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* him to them, \add even\add* all these \w words|strong="H1697"\w*,

Then \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hoshaiah|strong="H1955"\w*, and \w Johanan|strong="H3110"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kareah|strong="H7143"\w*, and all the \w proud|strong="H2086"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, Thou \w speakest|strong="H1696"\w* \w falsely|strong="H8267"\w*: the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath not \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* thee to \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Go|strong="H0935"\w* not into \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* to \w sojourn|strong="H1481"\w* there:

But \w Baruch|strong="H1263"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Neriah|strong="H5374"\w* setteth thee \w on|strong="H5496"\w* against us, for \w to|strong="H4616"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* us into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*, that they might put us to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*, and carry us away \w captives|strong="H1540"\w* into \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*.

So \w Johanan|strong="H3110"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kareah|strong="H7143"\w*, and all the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w forces|strong="H2428"\w*, and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* not the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, to \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

But \w Johanan|strong="H3110"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kareah|strong="H7143"\w*, and all the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w forces|strong="H2428"\w*, \w took|strong="H3947"\w* all the \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, that were \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* from all \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, whither they had been \w driven|strong="H5080"\w*, to \w dwell|strong="H1481"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*;

\add Even\add* \w men|strong="H1397"\w*, and \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, and \w children|strong="H2945"\w*, and the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, and every \w person|strong="H5315"\w* that \w Nebuzar-adan|strong="H5018"\w* the \w captain|strong="H7227"\w* of the \w guard|strong="H2876"\w* had \w left|strong="H3240"\w* with \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahikam|strong="H0296"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w*, and \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, and \w Baruch|strong="H1263"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Neriah|strong="H5374"\w*.

So they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: for they \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* not the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: thus \w came|strong="H0935"\w* they \add even\add* to \w Tahpanhes|strong="H8471"\w*.
¶ Then came the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* in \w Tahpanhes|strong="H8471"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* in thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w hide|strong="H2934"\w* them in the \w clay|strong="H4423"\w* in the \w brickkiln|strong="H4404"\w*, which \add is\add* at the \w entry|strong="H6607"\w* of \w Pharaoh’s|strong="H6547"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* in \w Tahpanhes|strong="H8471"\w*, in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3064"\w*;

And \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; Behold, I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* and \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w Nebuchadrezzar|strong="H5019"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, and will \w set|strong="H7760"\w* his \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w upon|strong="H4605"\w* these \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* that I have \w hid|strong="H2934"\w*; and he shall \w spread|strong="H5186"\w* his royal \w pavilion|strong="H8237"\w* over them.

And when he \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w*, he shall \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \add and deliver\add* such \add as are\add* for \w death|strong="H4194"\w* to \w death|strong="H4194"\w*; and such \add as are\add* for \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w* to \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w*; and such \add as are\add* for the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* to the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

And I will \w kindle|strong="H3341"\w* a \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* in the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*; and he shall \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* them, and carry them away \w captives|strong="H7617"\w*: and he shall \w array|strong="H5844"\w* himself with the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, as a \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w* putteth \w on|strong="H5844"\w* his \w garment|strong="H0899"\w*; and he shall go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* from thence in \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.

He shall \w break|strong="H7665"\w* also the \w images|strong="H4676"\w* of \w Beth-shemesh|strong="H1053"\w*, that \add is\add* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*; and the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* shall he \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.\f + \fr 43.13 \ft images: Heb. statues, or, standing images\f*\f + \fr 43.13 \ft Beth-shemesh: or, The house of the sun\f*
